name: Geostats
body:
### Geostatistics
Welcome to Introduction to Geostatistics! This class was designed to free and open to anyone that wants to learn about determining statistics on geographic data.  The target audience of the class is entry-level students with no experience in a statistics class.  The first half of the class is centered on teaching the student statistics, with some mention of geography.  The second half of the class focuses in on geographic statistical techniques.  This class focuses on application, and for brevity excludes much of the theory behind the application.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
